channel.title: No private servers save!
channel.description: might not be a very smart question but i recently bought a new pc and transferred my 317s to it from my old computer. after putting them on, they all work fine except from my characters dont save. it is not in the source as it has worked fine on various other computers. how can i make saving work?! everytime i log in, it says character file not found and there are no saves in the character save folder. thanks.

item.title: No private servers save!
item.dc:creator: @Slant Slant
item.description:
@Slant wrote:

Have you tested this with more then 1 source, because there could be a little anti leech on the source you are trying to use.

Read full topic
